Trade/Device Name(s): MultiSure GK Link Blood Glucose and Ketone Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): MultiSure GK Blood Glucose and Ketone Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MultiSure GK Link Blood Glucose and Ketone Monitoring System for self-testing of blood glucose and ketone at home using electrochemical biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to quantitatively measure blood glucose or blood ketone in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips for self-testing by people with diabetes mellitus at home to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not intended for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
